com.faltro.houdoku.controller

Class ReaderController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.controller.Controller
      • com.faltro.houdoku.controller.ReaderController

  • public class ReaderController
extends Controller
    The controller for the reader page.

    The FXML file for this view is at resources/fxml/reader.fxml

    See Also:
    Controller

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize the components of the controller's view.

        This method binds the size and position of components as appropriate, relative to the stage. It also initializes keyEventHandler which is enabled when the page is made active.

        Overrides:
        initialize in class Controller
        See Also:
        Controller.initialize()

      • onMadeActive

        public void onMadeActive()
        This method enables the keyEventHandler and begins loading the first page of the set chapter.
        Specified by:
        onMadeActive in class Controller
        See Also:
        Controller.onMadeActive()

      • onMadeInactive

        public void onMadeInactive()
        This method disables the keyEventHandler and resets components.
        Specified by:
        onMadeInactive in class Controller
        See Also:
        Controller.onMadeInactive()

      • newKeyEventHandler

        private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> newKeyEventHandler()
        Create a new KeyEvent EventHandler for controlling the page.

        Normally it would be sufficient to simply create the handler in initialize(), but the config with key bindings may change before the client is restarted, so we instead make a new event handler at every onMadeActive() using the current config.

        We also could have put Config.getValue's in the event itself, but that would be very inefficient.

        Returns:
        a complete KeyEvent EventHandler for the reader page

      • setImage

        public void setImage(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
        Set the image of the reader's ImageView.

        This method ensures that the image is set when the FX thread is available.

        Parameters:
        image - the Image to display in the ImageView
        See Also:
        imageView

      • previousChapter

        private void previousChapter()
        Go to the previous chapter and load the first page.

        This function does not validate whether a previous chapter is actually available - that should be enforced by disabling the prev chapter button.

      • nextChapter

        private void nextChapter()
        Go to the next chapter and load the first page.

      • toggleNavBar

        private void toggleNavBar()
        Toggle whether the navigation bar is visible.

        The navigation bar is the top bar which contains the page number display and forward/back buttons. Users who hide the bar can still navigate the display using the key shortcuts defined in keyEventHandler.

        See Also:
        showNavBarItem, navContainer, keyEventHandler

      • applyImageFilter

        private void applyImageFilter()
        Apply the appropriate filter to the page ImageView, if necessary.

      • updateImageViewFit

        private void updateImageViewFit()
        Update the imageView fit properties corresponding to the selected style.
        See Also:
        imageView, fitAutoRadio, fitHeightRadio, fitWidthRadio, actualSizeRadio

      • goToSeries

        private void goToSeries()
        Go to the series page.

        This method does not explicitly ensure that the series page contains the information for the expected series (that is, the series which contains the current chapter). It is expected that the components of the series page are not cleared when the reader is opened, and also that the series page has been loaded prior to opening the reader.

        See Also:
        SeriesController

        public Chapter getChapter()
